title.narrative: Sri Lanka - Transforming the School Education System as the Foundation of a Knowledge Hub

description.narrative: The project development objective is to enhance access to, and quality of, primary and secondary education to provide a foundation for the knowledge-based economic and social development of the country.

participating-org.narrative: Democratic Socialist Republic of Sri Lanka
Ministry of Local Government and Provincial Councils

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section I. B. 1. | Description :To facilitate the carrying out of the Project and the Program at theprovincial level, the Recipient shall make part of the proceeds of the Financing available to each PC under an agreement betweenthe Recipient, through the MLGPC, and that PC. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section I. E. 1. | Description :The Recipient shall, not later than October 31, in each year untilcompletion of the Project, commencing October 31, 2012, prepare and furnish to the Association for its review and endorsement, anESRP for the twelve (12) month period commencing on January 1 and ending on December 31 of the following year. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section II. A. 1. (a). | Description :The Recipient shall monitor and evaluate the progress of theProject, and prepare Project Reports in accordance with the provisionsof Section 4.08 of the General Conditions and on the basis ofthe indicators set forth in Attachment 2 to this Schedule. Each Project Report shall cover 6 months, and shall be furnished to IDAnot later than 45 days after the end of the period covered by such reports | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section II. A. 1. (b). | Description :The Recipient shall no later than November 30 of each year,commencing November 30, 2012, carry out joint reviews of the Project and the Program with the Association to, inter alia, assessthe progress of implementation and achievement of agreed results, and identify any obstacles or impediments. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section II. A. 1. (d). | Description :The Recipient shall, no later than October 31, 2014, prepare,under terms of reference satisfactory to IDA, and furnish to IDA, a report integrating the results of the monitoring and evaluationactivities on the progress achieved in the carrying out of the Project and in meeting the Disbursement Linked Indicators duringthe period preceding period. | Due Date :31-Oct-2014

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section II. B. 1. 2. and 3. | Description :The Recipient shall maintain or cause to be maintained afinancial management system in accordance with the provisions of Section 4.09 of the General Conditions. | Frequency :Yearly
